newsitem.title: USA: U.S. weekend box office chart -- May 23-26.
newsitem.headline: U.S. weekend box office chart -- May 23-26.

text.p: Following are the final data for the top 10 movies at the May 23-26 box office, according to Exhibitor Relations Co.
NOTE: "The Lost World: Jurassic Park" and "Liar Liar" are released by Universal Pictures, a unit of Seagram Co. Ltd. .
"Addicted To Love" and "Fathers' Day" are released by Warner Bros, a unit of Time Warner Inc..
"The Fifth Element" and "Anaconda" are released by Columbia Pictures, a unit of Sony Corp..
Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery" is released by New Line Cinema, a unit of Time Warner.
"Breakdown" and "Night Falls on Manhattan" are released by Paramount Pictures, a unit of Viacom Inc..
"Volcano" is released by 20th Century Fox, a unit of News Corp..
